name: Minecraft Bedrock
author: Birdactyl
description: Official Bedrock Dedicated Server for Windows/Xbox/Mobile players
install_script:
cd /home/container
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl unzip jq libcurl4
VERSION=$(curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bedrock-OSS/BDS-Versions/main/versions.json | jq -r '.linux.stable')
curl -A 'Mozilla/5.0' -L -o bedrock-server.zip "https://www.minecraft.net/bedrockdedicatedserver/bin-linux/bedrock-server-${VERSION}.zip"
unzip -o bedrock-server.zip
rm bedrock-server.zip
chmod +x bedrock_server

variables.name: SERVER_NAME
variables.description: Server name shown in server list
